reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress stylish, with one noting its cute ruching on the sleeves, and appreciate its good length and light weight. They describe it as comfortable, of good quality, and flattering, with one mentioning it hugs the curves well. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it fits well, others find it a bit clingy. The material quality also gets mixed reviews. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and cute
items.body: Comfortable and cute. Love it. Fits perfect. Read more
items.author: Kristen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress and love material
items.body: My daughter is a big girl around the MID section and she loved the way this dress fit her very flattering Read more
items.author: Lin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Summer fashionable
items.body: Cute. Fabric comfortable after washing sizing out. Cute with leggings too! Read more
items.author: Tonimakesminis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and comfortable
items.body: I love this dress! I bought another color as well. I bought large 5'4 180 lbs. Also got the cardigan on Amazon. Its a nice thickness so no undergarments show through. It's flowy and so comfortable. Color and print are vibrant. Awesome purchase I want to do buy all the colors. The green is a deeper color green. Read more
items.author: Michaela

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, just a poor fit.
items.body: I wanted to like this dress. The design is lovely and the fabric has a nice, flowy quality. However, it made my athletic build look tubby somehow. I really wanted to keep it because the color and fabric are nice, but just couldn't deal with how it made me look :D :D I would say that if it fits your body, it would be a great value. Read more
items.author: Rebecca B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, Tasteful Dress for All Ages
items.body: I got complements on this dress from friends at church and even from a lady sitting at another table at the restaurant where we had lunch. It is a comfortable, attractive and modest dress that can be worn with or without a sweater. It comes in a wide range of sizes and looks good on young and old folks. It would have been my "go to'' dress for parent conferences back when I was teaching. I ordered the blue and green print in my usual size, and it fit well without being snug across bust or hips. I am 5'3" tall, and the skirt came to just below my knees. Read more
items.author: Jane Deaux

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and comfy!
items.body: For an Amazon made dress, this is absolutely adorable! Very flattering material that hugs the curves, is very soft and flowy and can be styled up or down. There is some stretch to it which is nice. I'm shorter so this comes to my knees but that works out for me because i can wear this into the office now! Because it is thinner, i hope it holds up but either way, i will be buying more colors! Read more
items.author: Haley

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Navy, Black Ditsy Floral, Dark Toffee Brown Cheetah, Black, Raspberry Red, Bright Blue Floral, Dark Green Floral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
